title: Sparkling Gold Kangan Set - Traditional Vaala Jouelu with Modern Brilliance
materials: brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Features our signature Hyderabadi polish for unparalleled shine and durability.
features: These exquisite kangans boast a delicate, open design, featuring clusters of round brilliant-cut CZ stones prong-set along a slender 22K gold frame. The design offers a modern interpretation of the classic 'vaala jouelu,' blending traditional aesthetics with a contemporary minimalist style. The prong setting maximizes the sparkle of each CZ, creating a dazzling effect.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold with dazzling white Cubic Zirconia.
occasions: and modern celebrations. Ideal for adding a touch of sparkle to your casual or ethnic attire. A sophisticated choice for office parties or casual get-togethers.
description: These bangles offer a contemporary take on traditional South Indian jewelry, making them versatile and timeless. The 22K gold and brilliant-cut CZ stones combine to create a captivating sparkle. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability. A comfortable and stylish addition to any jewelry collection. The minimalist design makes it easy to pair with other bangles or bracelets.
